content:
~80%+ of the seats in congress are safe seats
it means that ~80%+ of the seats in congress are going to stay with the same political party no matter what candidate is in the running

effects:
this makes people more ideologically rigid
this causes more polarization for people towards either side
	because seats are so safe, candidates (the dudes in the running) have to only really listen to their own side of the argument (and not really pay attention to the other side)
	these candidates then tend to be more extremist to their end
		social media is also another thing that plays a role in extremist-ness (within the last 30 years) (side note extra)
